log4tailer.py – A multicolored log4j tailerÂ¶

Platforms: Unix, Linux

Module author: Jordi Carrillo <jordilin@jordiet.com>

This is the main entry point for the Log4Tailer project. It’s a simple script that uses the other modules to provide all the functionalities

./log4tailer [-s (silence mode) -c(- -config) configfile -p(- - pause) integer] logpaths

logpaths can be provided with command line globbing

configfile is optional and defines the colors to be used for each level, namely:

  • warn = yellow
  • info = green
  • debug = black
  • error = magenta
  • fatal = red

The above ones are the defaults and work well with a white or clear terminal color background
